query:
SELECT v.id, v.nome, v.telegramChatId, 
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM servicos_volante WHERE volanteId = v.id AND data = '2026-02-13') as servicos_hoje
FROM volantes v 
WHERE v.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT volanteId FROM agendamentos_volante WHERE DATE(data) = '2026-02-13');

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT v.id, v.nome, v.telegramChatId, 
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM servicos_volante WHERE volanteId = v.id AND data = '2026-02-13') as servicos_hoje
FROM volantes v 
WHERE v.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT volanteId FROM agendamentos_volante WHERE DATE(data) = '2026-02-13');
